name: Tank Meadows Tower Defense
description:
The meadows are under siege! Defend using towers, guns, and grenades. Stop the tanks before it's too late!!!

*** FOR BEST PERFORMANCE, DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS BUILD***

Controls

WASD: Move
Left Mouse Button: Click to fire gun, Hold to fire Machine Gun
Right Mouse Button: Lob Grenade
Space: Jump
Q: Turn into Tower
Escape: Toggle Pause Menu

Credits:

Developers: Hummus Man, @pmo_fillingham
Music: scowsh

Art: ???
